ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile (GSM Quad-Band). Not all carrier features may be supported.
5 Megapixel Camera with Auto Focus & Power LED Flash
3.0 Inch Full Touch Screen
MP3 Player, Music and Video Playback, FM Radio, Bulit in Social Networking, SMS, MMS & Email
